name: minions-applications-workspace
description: Application records, submission bundles, platform receipts, and status tracking
author: Mehdi Nabhani <mehdi@the-mehdi.com> (https://the-mehdi.com)

scripts.build: pnpm --filter @minions-applications/sdk run build && pnpm --filter @minions-applications/cli run build && pnpm --filter minions-applications-docs run build && pnpm --filter minions-applications-blog run build && pnpm --filter minions-applications-web run build
scripts.deploy:blog: pnpm --filter minions-applications-blog run build && netlify deploy --dir apps/blog/dist --prod
scripts.deploy:docs: pnpm --filter minions-applications-docs run build && netlify deploy --dir apps/docs/dist --prod
scripts.deploy:web: pnpm --filter minions-applications-web run build && netlify deploy --dir apps/web/dist --prod
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter @minions-applications/sdk run build && pnpm --filter @minions-applications/sdk run lint && pnpm --filter @minions-applications/cli run lint
